\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_2} & {B_2'} & C \\
	{A_1\oplus A_2} & M & C \\
	{A_1} & {A_1}
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{e_2}"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["m", from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{p_1}"', from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow["k", from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=3-1, to=3-2]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
